name: restArt (VitoPalermo, Leoo97)
description:
restArt is a 2.5 platformer game that aims at challenging players with two tasks at once: play an arcade game of tennis while juggling through ever changing platformer levels.

The game is currently at the early stages of production, lacking polish and tons of new fun mechanics we're planning to add, so any and all feedback will be appreciated.

Thank you for playing, and if you enjoy the current game and want more, make sure to leave us a comment and consider supporting us. Have fun in restArt!

Credits:

Vito Palermo (Design, Programming)

Leonardo Gentili (Design, 3D Art)

Simone Martella (3D Art)
